dcl_uav_typed_texture2d (uint,uint,uint,uint) u1
dcl_input vThreadID.xy
dcl_temps 7
dcl_thread_group 16, 16, 1

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 0405b7c2b5a207ec-cs.txt

mul r3.w, r3.x, r3.y
mul r5.x, r3.w, cb0[9].x
mul r5.y, r3.w, cb0[10].x
mul r5.z, r3.w, cb0[11].x
mul r5.w, r3.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r6.x, r5.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r6.y, r5.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r6.z, r5.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r4.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r6.xyz

itof r0.x, vThreadID.y
ge r0.y, r0.x, cb1[11].y
if_nz r0.y
  ret 
endif 
itof r0.y, vThreadID.x
lt r0.y, cb1[11].x, r0.y
lt r0.x, cb1[11].y, r0.x
or r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
if_nz r0.x
  ret 
endif 
ld_uav_typed_indexable(texture2d)(uint,uint,uint,uint) r0.x, vThreadID.xyyy, u1.xyzw
and r0.y, r0.x, l(2047)
utof r0.y, r0.y
mul r0.y, r0.y, cb0[66].x
mul r0.y, r0.y, l(0.000488519785)
ubfe r0.x, l(10), l(11), r0.x
utof r0.x, r0.x
mul r0.x, r0.x, cb0[66].y
mul r0.x, r0.x, l(0.000977517106)
ftou r1.xy, r0.yxyy
mov r1.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
ld_aoffimmi_indexable(0,0,0)(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r1.xyww, t1.xyzw
mov r0.y, l(1.000000)
dp2 r0.z, r0.xyxx, cb0[11].zwzz
dp2 r0.x, r0.xyxx, cb0[12].zwzz
div r0.x, -r0.z, r0.x
add r0.y, cb1[0].z, l(-100.000000)
lt r0.x, r0.x, r0.y
if_nz r0.x
  utof r0.x, r1.y
  mul r2.x, r0.x, cb1[11].w
  ld_aoffimmi_indexable(0,0,0)(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.xyz, r1.xyzw, t0.xyzw
  mad r2.y, -r0.x, cb1[11].w, l(1.000000)
  mul_sat r0.xy, r2.xyxx, l(10.000000, 10.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  mul r1.w, r0.y, r0.x
  store_uav_typed u0.xyzw, vThreadID.xyyy, r1.xyzw
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 40 instruction slots used
